title: Is Sony Acquiring More Studios? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.31.20
description:
Blessing and Tim unite once again on a Monday to discuss PlayStation Studios, backwards compatability, and more. 

Time Stamps -
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:10 - Housekeeping
TONIGHT at 12:01 am PT Greg is streaming Avengers for the first time! The plan is that Greg will stream when the servers go live. That’s supposedly at 12:01 am PT. However, Greg doesn’t trust the whole “midnight in your time zone” thing, so if it pops early, he’ll be on early.
The Roper Report   -
00:06:03 - Sony is acquiring more developers - Cian Maher @ VG247
00:16:45 - Are our PS5 Backwards Compatibility dreams dead? - Ubisoft Support FAQ page
00:24:30 - Ubisoft has apologized for 'insensitive and harmful' Elite Squad imagery - Brendain Sinclair @ GiBiz
00:31:30 - Every Post-Launch Character in Avengers Will Have a $10 Battle Pass - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:36:30 - Your Epic V Apple update: As promised, Apple has terminated Epic's developer account - Rebekah Valentine @ GiBiz
00:37:20 - Out today
00:42:33 -  Brooklinen
00:43:50 -  Logitech
00:45:10 -  HIMS
 Reader mail   -
00:46:40 - Why is the expectation that we should know the price and release date months before the product launch?  - B.J. Bumgarner
00:53:18 - Was Gamescom 2020 underwhelming this year? - BJ Bernardo
00:59:00 - Squad Up: Alec Bobko(TWTR) - KindaFunnyMI
00:59:39 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Imran
